resources.string: Click here to attempt an automatic discovery
Enable this option if the app does not work with your Sky Q (its firmware version may be lower than 060)
"This app turns your smartphone into a Sky Q (and Sky Q mini) remote. "
"For this app to work your smartphone and your Sky Q box(es) need to be connected to the same network. "
"You can then go into Settings and enter your Sky Q IP Address that can be found on your Sky Q from Settings > Status > Network Connection > Network Setup > Advanced Settings. "
"Or you can attempt an auto discovery from Settings > Auto discover devices > Run auto discovery and select one (if any) of the found devices. "

If you followed all the above instructions and the app still does not work then you can try enabling the michielan8@gmail.com option in the settings and repeating the discovery process. If this still does not work then contact me at Sky Q Legacy

The app was not able to communicate with the Sky Q; it seems that the configuration is incorrect. Make sure that the IP address is correct, that your smartphone and your Sky Q are connected to the same network and that you have checked/unchecked the Sky Q Legacy option based on your Sky Q firmware version.
